I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/secdev/scapy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository
COPY . /app/

# Install the required dependencies using tox
RUN pip install tox

# Run the test suite
RUN tox -- -K vcan_socket -K tcpdump -K tshark -K nmap -K manufdb -K crypto
